Nov. 21, 1998 D Forth Valley Championships

Best section 4 band - Kirkintilloch Kelvin. Best basses - Longannet Colliery. Best instrumentalist - Neil Philip (euphonium) Newtongrange. Best cornet - Richard Bromley (Kirkintilloch) Bedst horn - Alan Wardrope (Kirkintilloch)
